original_title: Frank Sinatra: Concert for the Americas
overview: This 1st-ever U.S. release of this spectacular 1982 concert proves that even at age 66, Francis Albert Sinatra was still the undisputed Chairman of the Board. This 90-minute performance features a memorable rendition of "Send In The Clowns" with guitarist Tony Mottola.
title: Frank Sinatra: Concert for the Americas
